data.text: I believed that coming to Tracen Academy would change my world――

After a fateful encounter with an exceptional Uma 
Musume, enjoying those halycon days. However, even 
after coming here, the days remained colorless.

I still wasn't reponsible for anyone, but I 
wasn't sure what to look for when scouting. I 
sighed, wondering if the dull days would continue.

It was during that time that I happened to see 
a certain Uma Musume on the training course. She 
hadn't debuted yet, but something caught my eye.
Haa…… Haa…… Ahaa☆ Ahahaa★
Ahahahahaa, Mar~vel~~ous☆★☆

Cheerfully laughing while running, I was 
captivated. She seemed to be delighted, 
having fun while she was running. That Uma Musume――

Suddenly, in the middle of the course 
she collapsed and layed sprawled out!
Zeh……Aha ……Hahaa ……zeh, Haa…… Ahahaha, haa.

Haa…… Ahaha…… Yeah☆ 
I'm just Marvelous★ Ahahaa☆

I was worried she had overexerted herself, but this Uma Musume was 
still laughing while out of breath. ……It was a little unnerving.
Oh geez~, you did it again, are you okay?
data.name: Nice Nature

data.text:
Can't you do something about that habit of yours of running 'til 
you drop? It's dangerous to fall on the course, don't you think?
data.name: Nice Nature

data.text:
But you see, Nature, today…… it felt like 
――Haa ……it'd be especially Marvelous!

Yeah, yeah. I figured you'd say that but, if you keep 
collapsing like that, it'll make everyone else worry!
data.name: Nice Nature

data.text:
Eh? ……Ah~, were you observing, Trainer-san? 
I guess it would be surprising if she suddenly 
fell~, but it's something that happens all the time!
data.name: Nice Nature

data.text:
This girl―― her name's Marvelous Sunday but, 
I guess you could say she's the type that 
doesn't know her own limits and just runs frantically?
data.name: Nice Nature

data.text:
She never puts on the brakes, so she ends up 
moving until she runs out of energy. She's like 
a little kid and ends up falling asleep mid-meal.
data.name: Nice Nature

data.text:
Anyways, it's not like she's sick or injured so there's no need to 
worry! I'm sure she'll be able to move after she rests for a bit!
data.name: Nice Nature

data.text:
Because it was such a memorable encounter, now, everytime I see a 
red ribbon, I can't help but follow it with my eyes. When I do――

Ahahahahaa, Ahahaa☆ 
The wax is so slippery~, the hallway's so shiny, Marvelous★
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
Geez, you're really energetic today too~. 
Make sure it's safe before you start running, okay?
data.name: Nice Nature

data.text:
Okaaa~y☆ 
Ahahaa~, slide slide~, Marvelous★
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text: Mystery tea!
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text: Mystery tea! ――gulp…… gulp……puhaa!
data.name: Mayano Top Gun

data.text: Ahahahaa, it's not good at all~!
data.name: Mayano Top Gun

data.text:
Ahahaa, you're right, it's not tasty at all☆ 
So mysterious and so yucky, but still very Marvelous★
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
Ahahahahaa, my arms feel like putty! My legs are shaking! 
I can't move~, Ma-rvelous☆★☆
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
Muscle soreness is Marvelous☆ Tomorrow will be more~ Marvelous★ 
Ow ow ow oww, Ahahahahaa☆
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
The word 『Marvelous』 repeatedly came out of Marvelous Sunday's mouth. 
After hearing it so many times, I was starting to have my doubts.

I can't even tell if it's something happy, painful, good, or bad. 
But, whenever she said 『Marvelous』, her expression seemed cheerful.

Maybe for her, the word had a different meaning than the one in the 
dictionary. I realized that I wanted to know what that meaning was.

C'mon~~, just when I felt like training today! 
I hate the rain, Maya's bored!
data.name: Mayano Top Gun

data.text:
But Mayano, the rain is really~ Marvelous, you know?☆ 
Especially when it's raining hard like this, it's even more Marvelous★
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
Eh~, how? If it's raining this hard, we might not be able 
to train tomorrow either, you know? Maya wants to run!
data.name: Mayano Top Gun

data.text:
That's true, if you can't run because it's 
raining, it's boring, huh?☆ But if you wait, 
and wait, and wait a little more for the sun then――
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
Then…… what? Maybe now I'll finally figure out what she means by 
marvelous. That's what I thought while lisenting closely, but――

Ahh, Maya's got it! You're right, I guess if you think 
about that then the rain might just be marvelous♪
data.name: Mayano Top Gun

data.text:
Right!? Ahahaa, rain, rain falling Marvelous~☆ 
Splish splash, splish splash Marve~lous★
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text: Marve~lous☆
data.name: Mayano Top Gun

data.text: Ahahahahaa, let's go!
data.name: Both

data.text:
My shoulders dropped because I didn't get my answer. Once again, 
today I was still unable to figure out what 『Marvelous』 meant.
